title: quinn stuck in bird form
body: friend played quinn in rift and got stuck in bird form somehow mid game. It says "cannot cast right now". Was eaten by Tahm Kench as a bird and now can't cancel ult at all and the timer is stuck at 118 second cd.

replies.body:
Hello ITS BARD CENA (lol, that name) - 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are working on a fix. ^-^
happend to a guy on my aram team earlier
